features: 100% recycled waterproof, breathable 2.5L Gore-Tex Paclite® fabric maximizes packability for everyday protection
Fully seam-sealed to lock out moisture
Brimmed hood with adjustable drawcord keeps hood in place throughout movement
Tricot-lined draft flap is soft on skin while preventing cold air entering through center zip
Two zippered hand pockets with stretch-mesh interior securely protects essentials
Hook and loop adjustable cuffs conform over gloves
Drop-tail hem ensures best coverage while eliminating bunching
Concealed hem cinch with low-profile toggle for secure positioning without irritation
One-side textured zipper pull makes adjustment easy even when wet
